text: Ok, this is a special section, an advanced bonus video for trend reversals where we will be looking at low auctioning activity at an extreme, so what that looks like, the lethargic nature of that and how the market turns around. We also look at high activity absorption extremes, so almost bipolar opposites of each other and then we look at the shift in the original price action providing and positioning. So there's a couple of videos that you can just click on here have a look so just to enhance your learning and really enhance the landscape of patterns that you have your at your disposal in order for you to trade in the live markets by picking up these various different types of price ladder patterns.
